mainBoard.name: Nightmare
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

rulings.text: If you control 0 swamps, then the Nightmare has 0 toughness and will be put into its owner’s graveyard as a state-based action right before the next player gains priority.
Nightmare’s power and toughness changes as the number of Swamps you control changes.
Nightmare’s ability counts all lands you control with the subtype Swamp, not just ones named Swamp.
The ability that defines Nightmare’s power and toughness works everywhere, not just on the battlefield.

mainBoard.name: Sengir Vampire
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

rulings.text: If Sengir Vampire deals nonlethal damage to a creature and then a different effect or damage source causes that creature to be put into a graveyard later in the turn, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger and it will get a +1/+1 counter.

Each time a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, check whether Sengir Vampire had dealt any damage to it at any time during that turn. If so, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger. It doesn't matter who controlled the creature or whose graveyard it was put into.
If Sengir Vampire and a creature it dealt damage to are both put into a graveyard at the same time, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger, but it will do nothing when it resolves.

mainBoard.text:

foreignData.flavorText: 「普通の軍隊の場合、食糧確保が問題となる。ゾンビの場合、それが強みになる。奴らは食うために戦い、食うから恐れられる。」 ――ネファリアのグール呼び、ジャダー

foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビ

foreignData.flavorText: "식량은 일반 부대의 병참술에서는 골치 아픈 문제이지만 좀비를 다룰 때는 중요한 자산이 된다. 식량이야말로 좀비들이 싸우는 이유이며, 적이 그들을 두려워하는 이유이기도 하다." —네팔리아의 악귀소환술사 자다르
foreignData.name: 걸어다니는 시체

foreignData.flavorText: "A alimentação de um exército normal é um problema de logística. A alimentação de zumbis é uma vantagem. Eles lutam para comer. E são temidos por isso." — Jadar, invocador de carniçais de Nefália
foreignData.name: Cadáver Ambulante

foreignData.flavorText: «Для обычной армии пища — это проблема снабжения. Для армии зомби — тактическое преимущество. Их пища — это то, почему они сражаются. Их пища — это то, почему их боятся». — Джадар, призыватель упырей из Нефалии
foreignData.name: Ходячий Труп

foreignData.flavorText: 「正常的军队要考虑食粮补给的问题。而这正是灵俑部队的优点。他们因进食而战。也因进食而被人惧怕。」 ～涅非利亚尸鬼牧者贾达

foreignData.flavorText: 「正常的軍隊要考慮食糧補給的問題。而這正是殭屍部隊的優點。他們因進食而戰。也因進食而被人懼怕。」 ～涅非利亞屍鬼牧者賈達

foreignData.text: Siempre que lances un hechizo negro o un pantano entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, ganas 1 vida.

foreignData.flavorText: Un symbole d'ambition en des temps impitoyables.
foreignData.name: Bâton du magus de mort
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort noir ou qu'un marais arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, vous gagnez 1 point de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Un simbolo di ambizione in tempi senza scrupoli.
foreignData.name: Bastone del Magus Letale
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia nera o una Palude entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, guadagni 1 punto vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 冷酷な時代の大志の象徴。
foreignData.name: 死の大魔術師の杖
foreignData.text: あなたが黒の呪文を１つ唱えるか沼が１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、あなたは１点のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: 이 지팡이는 잔혹한 시대의 야망을 상징한다.
foreignData.name: 죽음마도사의 지팡이
foreignData.text: 당신이 흑색 주문을 발동하거나 늪이 당신의 조종 하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Um símbolo de ambição em tempos de impiedade.
foreignData.name: Cajado do Magus da Morte
foreignData.text: Toda vez que você conjura uma mágica preta ou um Pântano entra no campo de batalha sob o seu controle, você ganha 1 ponto de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: Символ честолюбия во времена беспощадности.
foreignData.name: Посох Волхва Смерти
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете черное заклинание или Болото выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, вы получаете 1 жизнь.

foreignData.flavorText: 在无情的时代中象征着野心。
foreignData.name: 死亡法师杖
foreignData.text: 每当你施放黑色咒语或每当一个沼泽在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。

foreignData.flavorText: 在無情的時代中象徵著野心。
foreignData.name: 死亡法師杖
foreignData.text: 每當你施放黑色咒語或每當一個沼澤在你的操控下進戰場時，你獲得1點生命。

mainBoard.name: Staff of the Death Magus
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever you cast a black spell or a Swamp enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

rulings.text: Each of these artifacts cares about any land with the appropriate basic land type. For example, Staff of the Sun Magus’s ability triggers when any land with the subtype Plains enters the battlefield under your control, not just lands named Plains.
If you cast a copy of a card that’s a certain color, the appropriate Staff’s ability will trigger. However, if you copy a spell on the stack without casting that copy, it will not.

Most nonbasic lands don’t have basic land types, even if they produce colored mana. For example, Caves of Koilos is neither a Plains nor a Swamp. Having one enter the battlefield under your control won’t cause Staff of the Sun Magus’s ability to trigger.

mainBoard.text: Whenever you cast a black spell or a Swamp you control enters, you gain 1 life.
